incidentsData.title: World Central Kitchen runs out of food
incidentsData.description: Just over two months after Israeli authorities stopped all aid entering Gaza, World Central Kitchen announced it had no more food to distribute.

incidentsData.title: Israeli strike hits bakery in Gaza City
incidentsData.description: At least 10 civilians were killed and more than 60 wounded.

incidentsData.title: Israeli forces fire on people waiting for aid
incidentsData.description: Fire from Israeli forces killed at least three, including a boy of about 10 years old, reported TNH contributor Hani Qarmoot, who witnessed the strike.
